verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> Apostle <S%G652><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> By The <S%G1223><s%> Will <S%G2307><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> ' According To <S%G2596><s%> Promise <S%G1860><s%> Of Life <S%G2222><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>

To Timothy My <S%G5095><s%> Beloved <S%G27><s%> Child : <S%G5043><s%> Grace, <S%G5485><s%> Mercy, <S%G1656><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> From <S%G575><s%> God The <S%G2316><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Our Lord. <S%G2257><s%>

<S%G5485><s%> I Am Thankful <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God, <S%G2316><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> I Serve <S%G3000><s%> From My <S%G575><s%> Forefathers <S%G4269><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Pure <S%G2513><s%> Conscience, <S%G4893><s%> How <S%G5613><s%> Unceasingly <S%G88><s%> I Have <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Of <S%G4012><s%> Thee <S%G4675><s%> Remembrance <S%G3417><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1162><s%> My Supplications <S%G3450><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Day, <S%G2250><s%>

Longing <S%G1971><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> To See, <S%G1492><s%> Remembering <S%G3415><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Tears, <S%G1144><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> With Joy <S%G5479><s%> I May Be Filled; <S%G4137><s%>

Remembrance <S%G5280><s%> Taking <S%G2983><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> Unfeigned <S%G505><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> Dwelt <S%G1774><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3125><s%> Thy Grandmother <S%G4675><s%> Lois <S%G3090><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G3588><s%> Mother <S%G3384><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> Eunice, <S%G2131><s%> <S%G3982><s%> And I Am Persuaded <S%G1161><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Thee. <S%G4671><s%>

' For <S%G1223><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Cause <S%G156><s%> I Remind <S%G363><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> To Kindle Up <S%G329><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Gift <S%G5486><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Laying On <S%G1936><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> Of My Hands. <S%G3450><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> A Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Of Cowardice, <S%G1167><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Of Power, <S%G1411><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Love, <S%G26><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Wise Discretion. <S%G4995><s%>

Not <S%G3361><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Thou Shouldest Be Ashamed Of <S%G1870><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Testimony <S%G3142><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord, <S%G2257><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> Me <S%G1691><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1198><s%> His Prisoner; <S%G846><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Suffer Evils Along With <S%G4777><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> God's; <S%G2316><s%>

Who <S%G3588><s%> Saved <S%G4982><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Called <S%G2564><s%> Us With A Calling <S%G2821><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2041><s%> Our Works, <S%G2257><s%> But <S%G235><s%> ' According To <S%G2596><s%> His Own <S%G2398><s%> Purpose <S%G4286><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Grace, <S%G5485><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Given <S%G1325><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Before <S%G4253><s%> <S%G5550><s%> The Ages Of Time, <S%G166><s%>

<S%G5319><s%> But Made Manifest <S%G1161><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Appearing <S%G2015><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4990><s%> Of Our Saviour <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> <S%G2673><s%> Who Annulled <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Death, <S%G2288><s%> Brought To Light <S%G5461><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Incorruptibility <S%G861><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings; <S%G2098><s%>
To <S%G1519><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Was Appointed <S%G5087><s%> I 1473 P-1NS A Herald 2783 N-NSM And 2532 CONJ Apostle 652 N-NSM And 2532 CONJ Teacher 1320 N-NSM Of The Nations. 1484 N-GPN

' For <S%G1223><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Cause <S%G156><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> I Suffer; <S%G3958><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> I Am Ashamed; <S%G1870><s%> <S%G1492><s%> For I Know <S%G1063><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> I Have Believed, <S%G4100><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Am Persuaded <S%G3982><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Able <S%G1415><s%> He Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Deposit Committed To Him <S%G3866><s%> Of Me <S%G3450><s%> To Keep <S%G5442><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Day. <S%G2250><s%>

A Delineation <S%G5296><s%> Have <S%G2192><s%> Of Sound <S%G5198><s%> Words, <S%G3056><s%> Which Words <S%G3739><s%> ' From <S%G3844><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> Thou Didst Hear, <S%G191><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Which Are <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> Deposit Committed To Thee <S%G3872><s%> Keep <S%G5442><s%> By The <S%G1223><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Dwells <S%G1774><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Us. <S%G2254><s%>

Thou Knowest <S%G1492><s%> This, <S%G5124><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Turned Away From <S%G654><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Who Are <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Asia, <S%G773><s%> Of Whom <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Phygellus <S%G5436><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hermogenes. <S%G2061><s%>

May Grant <S%G1325><s%> Mercy <S%G1656><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Of Onesiphorus <S%G3683><s%> House, <S%G3624><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Oft <S%G4178><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> He Refreshed, <S%G404><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G254><s%> My Chain <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3756><s%> , Was Not Ashamed Of; <S%G1870><s%>
But <S%G235><s%> Having Been <S%G1096><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Rome, <S%G4516><s%> More Diligently <S%G4706><s%> He Sought Out <S%G2212><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Found Me <S%G2147><s%>

May Grant <S%G1325><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> To Find <S%G2147><s%> Mercy <S%G1656><s%> From The <S%G3844><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> How Much <S%G3745><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Ephesus <S%G2181><s%> He Served <S%G1247><s%> Better Than I Need Say <S%G957><s%> <S%G957><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Knowest. <S%G1097><s%>
